legend_0018_head_teacher_02:
Please do try to keep your voice down if you’re
making calls within the school, won’t you?[npcn:A]
legend_0018_head_teacher_03:
You don’t want anyone else overhearing any
personal information, after all.[npcn:A]
legend_0018_head_teacher_04:
Honestly... There are so many things we need to
be careful about in this day and age.[npcn:A]
